title: Boku No Risou No Isekai Seikatsu ~Tensei Shitara Kemomimi Musume Darake No Sekai De Harem Ni~
alternative_title: ボクの理想の異世界生活 ～転生したらケモ耳娘だらけの世界でハーレムに～ ; Mi vida ideal de otro mundo - Reencarnación en un mundo lleno de chicas Nekomimi ; My Ideal Life in Another World: Reincarnated in Another World With a Harem of Animal-eared Girls
status: ボクの理想の異世界生活 ～転生したらケモ耳娘だらけの世界でハーレムに～ ; Mi vida ideal de otro mundo - Reencarnación en un mundo lleno de chicas Nekomimi ; My Ideal Life in Another World: Reincarnated in Another World With a Harem of Animal-eared Girls
description:
Description :
        A 40-year-old virgin man working for a black company has never been with a girl, let alone married one. Having nothing to do but love cute girls, one day he loses consciousness during an all-nighter of work――. When he wakes up...he finds himself reborn as "Norun," a male with cat ears, in another world full of animal-eared girls, where there are far more females than males!!!? His cute fiancée, Misha, and other attractive girls with animal-ears who are potential brides appear before him one after the other――!?Thus begins "Norun's" dream-filled otherworldly life ♪ However, this world has a big secret......!? He can procreate with cute girls as much as he wants!!? The slow sex life in another world, which has become a big hit in the doujinshi scene and has been downloaded more than 300,000 times, is about to begin――!!!!!*****Translator's Notes:*** This is the manga serialization of the doujinshi series. Look up just "My Ideal Life in Another World" for the doujinshi (18+) version that focuses on the adult stuff rather than the plot. If you're looking for both, look up my "My Ideal Life in Another World Perfected Fan Edition" to see the combined version of both manga and doujinshi, giving you the best of both worlds. It can be found both here on MangaDex and ExHentai.---**Links:** - (https://mangadex.org/title/b902796f-79d7-47f7-8540-731eb8b08f98/my-ideal-life-in-another-world-perfected-fan-edition)
